required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Engineered TILs/CAR-TILs to Treat Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: Engineered TILs/CAR-TILs With PD1 Knockout and Anti-PD1/CTLA4-scFv Secreting or CARs Against Various Antigens to Treat Advanced Solid Tumors

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University

collaborator.agency: Guangdong Zhaotai InVivo Biomedicine Co. Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: Tumor infiltration lymphocytes (TILs) have been harvested from advanced cancer patients and constructed to knockout PD1 gene and express scFvs against both PD1 and CTALA4 and CARs against various antigens, followed by transfusion into the patients. The safety, tolerance, and preliminary clinical efficacy of the TILs will be evaluated.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety of TILs/CAR-TILs treatment in advanced solid cancers
primary_outcome.description: Assessing Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v4.0.

secondary_outcome.measure: Primary clinical efficacy of the TILs/CAR-TILs treatment in advanced solid cancers
secondary_outcome.description: Assessing various clinical response rates including complete response, partial response, stable disease, and progress disease during and after TILs/CAR-TILs treatment in advanced solid cancers.

arm_group.description: Obtain TILs/CAR-TILs from advanced solid tumor patients and infuse them back to evaluate safety and clinical efficacy of the treatment.

intervention.intervention_name: TILs and CAR-TILs targeting HER2, Mesothelin, PSCA, MUC1, Lewis-Y, GPC3, AXL, EGFR, Claudin18.2/6, ROR1, GD1, or B7-H3
intervention.description: TILs and CAR-TILs injection: 1-10Ã—10e7/kg cells for each treatment; 3 or more cycles.

overall_official.affiliation: Second Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University

facility.name: Second Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University
